sourcesContent:
import React, { useCallback, useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react' // DATA Files import dataNavbar from "webapp/common/data/Navbar/main-navbar-data.json"; // Components import { HeaderOne, FooterOne } from 'webapp/common' import PageTitleArt from 'webapp/art/component/PageTitleArt'; import 'webapp/art/style/Art.css' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import ArtUpload from '../Register/ArtUpload'; import { getArtModify, getArtRead } from 'webapp/art/reducer/art.reducer'; import { useParams } from 'react-router'; import ModifyFile from './ModifyFile'; import ModifyUpload from './ModifyUpload'; const ArtModify = ({ tagline, title, backfont, dash, textBtn, classes }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { id } = useParams() const art = useSelector(state => state.arts.current) const fileList = useSelector(state => state.arts.fileList) console.log("art", art) console.log("fileList", fileList) console.log("files", art.files) const [input, setInput] = useState({ title: art.title, category: art.category.categoryId, description: art.description, artist: art.artist, resume: art.resume, }) useEffect(() => { dispatch(getArtRead(id)) }, []) const handleChange = e => { e.stopPropagation() e.preventDefault() setInput({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const ArtModify = e => { e.stopPropagation() e.preventDefault() const data = {...input, files: fileList.map(i => i.file)} dispatch(getArtModify(data)) } console.log(input) return ( <>
{art?.files.map(fileObj => { console.log("fileObj", fileObj) return ( ) })}
handleChange(e)} />
